New Records: Mohammed Shami became India’s leading wicket-taker in 50-over World Cups
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and Shubman Gill put on 189 for India’s second wicket
Sri Lanka lost four wickets for three runs inside four overs
Mohammed Shami took five wickets for 18
Pre-Game Insights: No specific pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said India are'very happy knowing we have officially qualified'
Kusal Mendis cut a disappointed figure, stating the wicket was slow but then had some seam and swing
Miscellaneous Highlights: India became the first team to qualify for the knockout stages of the Cricket World Cup
India secured their seventh win from as many matches
The match was played in Mumbai
